rooms.description: Entry area with foyer leading to the main living spaces.
Spacious living room decorated in Art Deco style featuring geometric patterns and bold colors.
Dining area adjoining the kitchen, aligning with Vastu principles for harmony in food preparation.
Modern kitchen setup ensuring efficient workflow and adherence to local safety norms.
Fully equipped gym with dedicated ventilation and soundproofing as per local building codes.
Self-contained servant's quarters designed for privacy and comfort.

openings.description: Stately Art Deco inspired door providing secure entry.
Dedicated service entrance ensuring discreet access to servant's quarters and private gym area.
